DOC.brief_summary: The goal study evaluate ability natural supplement ( betaine hydrochloride ) affect absorption dasatinib healthy volunteer . The investigator predict betaine hydrochloride increase absorption dasatinib , volunteer pre-treated proton-pump inhibitor ( PPIs ) .
DOC.criteria: Male female 1859 year age Healthy adult active medical problem significant chronic disease determine study doctor base history , physical exam laboratory evaluation BMI 18.530 kg/m2 Taking medication 2 week study enrollment , include drug abuse , prescription overthecounter ( OTC ) medication ( except acetaminophen ) Subjects able maintain adequate birth control study independent hormonal contraceptive use Be able provide write informed consent comply requirement study Avoid eat grapefruit drinking grapefruit juice 7 day first study day completion entire study Abstinence alcoholic beverage , caffeinated beverage orange juice 3pm night study day completion study day Fast food beverage least 8 hour prior medication dose Be able read , speak , understand English Subjects history gastrointestinal disease include gastroesophageal reflux disease , gastritis , peptic ulcer disease , dyspepsia Subjects fast gastric pH > 4 ( i.e . hypochlorhydria ) Subjects history dysphagia , achalasia , difficulty swallow capsule , tablet , pill Subjects prescription chronic overthecounter ( OTC ) medication ( include hormonal contraceptive ) Subjects known allergy rabeprazole proton pump inhibitor ( PPI 's ) betaine hydrochloride Subjects smoke tobacco Subjects ongoing alcohol illegal drug use Subjects pregnant , lactate , attempt conceive Subjects unable maintain adequate birth control study
